bibl.title: Lochos and Ariston
bibl.note: The documents [all derive from mummy cartonnage]. - Officials [Lochos, possibly the well-known strategos of the Thebaid; the strategos Ariston]. - Dates. - Provenance. - 1. Letter to Ariston: P. Duke Inv. 324. Herakleopolite(?), ca 129 B.C.(?). - 2. Letter to Ariston from Horion: P. Duke Inv. 325. Herakleopolite(?), ca 129 B.C.(?). - 3. Letter to Ariston from Konnos: P. Duke Inv. 326. Herakleopolite(?), Dec. 12, 129 B.C.(?). - 4. Letter to Ariston: P. Duke Inv. 327. Herakleopolite(?), ca Dec. 12, 129 B.C.(?). - 5. Letter to Ariston from Lochos: P. Duke Inv. 328. Herakleopolite(?), ca 129 B.C.(?). - 6. Letter to Ariston from Chairemon and P[---]: P. Duke Inv. 329. Herakleopolite(?), Aug. 1, 129 B.C. - 7. Letter to Ariston: P. Duke Inv. 330. Herakleopolite(?), Jan. 23 - Feb. 21, 129 B.C. - 8. Letter to Ariston: P. Duke Inv. 331. Herakleopolite(?), ca 129 B.C.(?) - 9. Official letter: P. Duke Inv. 336. Herakleopolite(?), ca Dec. 12, 129 B.C.(?).

Herakleopolite(?), ca 129 B.C.(?). - 6. Letter to Ariston from Chairemon and P[---]: P. Duke Inv. 329. Herakleopolite(?), Aug. 1, 129 B.C. - 7. Letter to Ariston: P. Duke Inv. 330. Herakleopolite(?), Jan. 23 - Feb. 21, 129 B.C. - 8. Letter to Ariston: P. Duke Inv. 331. Herakleopolite(?), ca 129 B.C.(?) - 9. Official letter: P. Duke Inv. 336. Herakleopolite(?), ca Dec. 12, 129 B.C.(?).
